# 𓅾 fear

Very fluent R⇔L peur⇔pale forms:

𒁄 𒄩 pal-ḫa peur fear
𒉺𒌓 pa-liḫ •pale "fear"
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-LA-ḫu •pale “revere, to fear”
𒉺𒊏𒁺 pa-ra-du «peur'de» terrified, to be scared
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-ra-ḫu ⋍ fear ভয় bhôẏ
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-dra-ḫu ⋍ ডর ḍôr ზარი zari
𒉺𒆷𒄷 pa-ra-ḫu 𐍆𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌷𐍄𐌴𐌹 Furchtei Fürchten Furcht ⇔
𒉺… פָּחַד pákhad
𒉺… 怕 pà(hai)
𒉺… φόβος phóbos
𒉺… Bange™ (nasal pákhad)

𒅆 •PAK во́ка begi πAug աչք ačʿkʿ আঁখি ãkhi okulo < во́ка vóka begi @Basque < бӏаьрг bʿärg !!! > ⲃⲁⲗ bal

𒅆𒌅 •pak-ḫit-tu פָּחַד pákhad “fear”
𒅆𒌅 •bärg-ḫit-tu ፍርሃት fərhat 𐍆𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌷𐍄𐌴𐌹 faurḫtei feared Furcht™ frygt paüra peur
𒅆𒌅 fear ⇔ φόβος phóbia ⇔ во́ка ⇔ verbergen! *bʰergʰ бере́чь beréčʹ *berťi ⇔ wart ⇔ guard

𒄯𒁀𒋗 ᵠḫur-ba φόβος phóboς < •phurbia™ phobie

𒁍𒈛𒌅 pu-luḫ-tu •Flucht < •Furcht
𒁍𒈛𒌅 pu-ruḫ-tu •Flucht < •Furcht
𒁍𒈛𒌅 fear(someness) ⇔ beast 𒁍𒇻 •puᵏ-ru

•GVR

𒅆 ҡурҡыу qurqïw “fear”

𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 Graus <
𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 gorky qorxu ҡурҡыу *kork@Turk ⇔ Kerker 𓂓𓊖

𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 кхера qērə
𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 tsoro @ Hausa +++

𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 შიში šiši “Schiss” (vulgar) (𓂋 𓅾 'os vulgar latin)

horror

𒄯 𒁀 𒋗 ḫur-ba-šu | horror fear
𒄯 𒁀 𒋗 ḫur -baʳ -šu | hoar frost

𒄯 𒁀 𒋗 ˢḫur-ba-šu | 𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 | fear
𒄯 𒁀 𒋗 ᵍḫur-ba-šu | 𓋴 𓂋 𓅾 | Graus

Terror

𓎛 𓁷 𓂋 ḫair-ob-arse | ha.fear / horror / terror / dread

𐎫𐎼𐎿𐎫𐎡𐎹 (t-r-s-t-i-y /tạrsatiy/)

𒋼 TE teĝ₃ •tergh in 𒉆𒋼 sy•tergh страх strax страх strah sy•teʳᵒ terror fear

𓅾 𓏏 𓏤 тæрсын tærsyn tearse dread ⇔ 𓅂 𓄛

𓅾 𓏏 𓏤 kṣuḍ ϩⲟϯ, (ⲉⲣ) ϩⲟⲧⲉ ggʷd ⇔ Ganter goose.the

𓈖 𓂋 𓆂 𓂡 | fear, dread, disturbance | ⲛϩⲟⲩⲣ , ⲉⲛϩⲟⲩⲣ tremble, cause to tremble, be terrible n. shuddering, fear
𓈖 𓂋 𓆂 𓂡 | fear, dread, disturbance | ANGER
𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓅾 | fear | Angst & Not ** ⇔ 𓆓 𓏏 𓅾 dread ?
𓈖 𓅐 𓂝 | fear, dread, disturbance | Unmut ⇔ 𐌼𐌰𐍂𐌶𐌾𐌰𐌽 martyre?
𓈖 𓅐 𓂝 | fear, dread, disturbance | ⲛⲟϣⲉⲣ = 𓅐 vulture !
𓈖 𓂋 𓅱 𓅐 𓀜 𓏪 | fear, dread, disturbance|
𓈖 𓂋 𓅱 𓆂 𓂡 𓏥 | fear, dread, disturbance|

ⲉⲛϩⲟⲩⲣ ⲛϩⲟⲩⲣ ⇔ …ϩⲟⲩⲣ horror хӑра hăra 𓂋 𓆂 𓂡 < terror 𓆂 𓏥

** full form with syn prefix:
𓊃 𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓅾 | fear | sandat ⋍ scanradh@Irish Schreck strax skrag sṅaṅs scare susto ⋍ sũnDto

𓆂 𓏥, 𓅾 𓏏 𓏤 , 𓆓, 𓊃 𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓅾 2. 𓈖 𓂋 𓂡 𓈖 𓂋 𓅱 𓅐 𓀜 𓏪, 𓈖 𓂋 𓅱 𓆂 𓂡 𓏥 3. 𓈖 𓅐 𓂝 4. 𓋴 𓂋 𓅾

𓈖 𓂋 𓅱 𓅐 𓀜 𓏪 | disturb | nerven nörgeln annoy 𐌿𐌽𐍅𐌴𐍂𐌾𐌰𐌽 unwerken/umwerfen

𒁍𒈛𒋫 𒊏𒈬 pu-luḫ-ta ra-mu •Flucht machen
𒁍𒈛𒋫 𒊏𒈬 to inspire fear •Furcht machen

𒉺𒊏𒆪 pa-ra-ku преку preku +++
𒉺𒊏𒆪 obstruct, to lie across ⇔ παρά para
